body.p: Spencer County, Kentucky, painter. Spencer County native. Son of Reason heady and Ann Shelburne Heady. Married Susan M. Boston Heady in January 1856. Father of John B. Heady, Mary Heady, and Reason J. Heady. Painter in Spencer County from 1852 to 1861. Saddle and harness maker in Spencer County from 1863 to 1867. Member of the Elk Creek Baptist Church.

bibl.p: J. H. Battle, W. H. Perrin, & G. C. Kniffin, Kentucky: A History of the State 6th Ed. (Louisville:Battey Publishing, 1887), 803.
